page.title: 08L.parish H.Priors-Farm Visit
page.content: 04400144 We visited a typical farm in the area at the end of May, travelling by tractor and trailer.A very large acreage of cereals is grown. Wheat Winter 1100 acres,Durum 60 acres Barley Winter 50 acres,Spring 60 acres Triticale 33 acres.A quarter of the farm is given over to intensive pig- rearing.There are 1000 breeding sows with average age of 3-4years.The main breeds are Black Saddleback,Wessex x. and Flopear.Average litter 2-2.3 (21pigs)per year.40 sows farrow each week. The rounded shelters are made of plastic sacks recycled by the farm. To prevent water in the troughs freezing. Large lit candles are placed underneath,burning for 18 hours.290 acres of herbage seed is grown and this is sold.The farm is highly mechanised .
